title: Google: “Get the best summary”

author: Andreas Thalhammer, F. Hoffmann-La Roche Ltd
Magnus Knuth, Hasso-Plattner-Institute, University of Potsdam
category: Top->Computer Science->Semantic Web->RDF - Resource Description Framework

segmentation: Hello everybody, my name is Andreas Talama.

17 This is really a lot of triples, and this has to be broken down and some reasonable format, and for this we have.
For this Google came up with an approach which is called the Google Knowledge Graph and in fact they really present only 14 triples.
And the task of getting this done is quite interesting and.
And our paper.
We presented an evaluation approach which is based on games.
And now I will hand over to my colleague Magnus Card.
So for creating an every.
Dataset about for entity summarization we developed the game which is called who knows movies.
The game bases on the Freebase data set about 60 movies.
And that we expect from Freebase we use the white list of properties that are asked in this game to the player.
So we post questions to the game according to triples in the Freebase data set.
So in this case we have to we have a example question.
John Travolta is the actor of Aether Printers Pride profiled or pipe fiction?
The question is created from the triple pipe fiction.
Is the actor John Travolta?
And to create this question we put the triple upside down so we pose the question in the style of the object.
Is is property of subject 1, two or three and as wrong candidates answering candidates we select subjects that have the same property but do not occur with the object in question.
There are several question types.
One is 1 to one and one to N. You can play the game at the URL named on the slides.
We collect the answers from the users and do statistics.
How often player knows the correct answer or not, and we assume that answers that.
Peoples that are known by users are relevant for summarization and answers that are frequently not known or not that relevant.
You can help us collecting more data.
Playing the game, which is quite some fun and you also can get the data from our website.
Thank you.
